text: Kuhĩrĩriai Ngai, nake nĩekũmũkuhĩrĩria. Mwĩthambei moko manyu inyuĩ ehia, na mũtherie ngoro cianyu inyuĩ andũ a ngoro igĩrĩ.4:8 Athĩnjĩri-Ngai matanakuhĩrĩria Ngai Hema-inĩ-ya-Gũtũnganwo nĩmambaga gwĩthamba magũrũ na moko mbakũri-inĩ ya gĩcango arĩ njĩra ya gwĩtheria kĩĩroho (Thaam 30:17-21).
